Reviews.Title: great camera used as a dummy in outdoor houseing.
Reviews.Author: ARD GROUP INC
Reviews.Content: The camera itself looks real but the mount don't. Blinking lights on cameras do give it away as a fake. In my case I removed the mount and left the antenna off and used it as a dummy camera inside a outdoor camera houseing. You can not tell its fake looks just like ones you would see at a store the way I did it. I did not try to put batterys in it so I can't comment on if it pans or the like blinks or if the motor is loud as others have stated.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Avid Buyer
Reviews.Content: I got this super quick. It looks good in hallway so everyone sees it and gets the idea. Only flaw is the motor that turns is SO loud. Almost gives it away as a dummy. Wish it was quieter.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: KodisDad "kodibear"
Reviews.Content: These camerias combined with the live ones give the impression of larger coverage than the few cameras that are the live one. It is hard to tell the difference.

Reviews.Title: So-So
Reviews.Author: Dwight
Reviews.Content: Motion detection feature sometimes works, sometimes not. As I pull into my driveway, my car always sets it in motion, at night. However, does not always work during the day, unless you are really close to it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Average conditions allow transmission up to 1 000 ft. On longer runs video quality might be slightly reduced
They can also be used to temporarily replace faulty cameras in case spares are not available while repairs are being performed
The camera has a motor which slowly swings it back and forth. This combines with the blinking red LED to indicate camera activity and further emulate a real security camera
ProductInfo.Name: Monoprice 108427 Dummy Wireless Brick Camera Motorized with Switchable On/Off LED (Black)
